document_data.name: Anthan Narlgold
document_data.mainbody: '''Anthan Narlgold''' was a [[Half-dwarf|half-dwarven]] warrior of [[Clan Narlgold]].
document_data.Personality: Anthan was a heroic and fearless warrior.
document_data.Relationships: Anthan Nargold was the son of Clan Chief [[Jhaz Narlgold]] and the heir of Clan Narlgold.
document_data.History: In [[Calendar of Harptos|Hammer]] of [[714 DR]], Anthan took part in the [[Darkwoods Conflict]] and was present at the [[Lost Trench]]. Towards the close of the battle, Anthan killed the enemy commander; a [[nycaloth]] named [[Gaulguth]]. Anthan impaled Gaulguth with a 7-foot-long spike of [[mithral]]. As Gaulguth died, he swung his great axe [[Heartcleaver]] and split Anthan in two, killing him instantly.
